fields.description:
As a auditor 
I need to view all events from a specific time period for the Tenancy 
So that I can determine if the tenancy has been used in an appropriate way.

As a Waters Customer Success Manager
I want to see if a new customer has reached pre-determined milestones in the software
So that we can understand if they might need assistance in configuring up their tenancy

As a Waters Product Owner
 I want to analyse how waters_connect SaaS applications are being used
 So that I can make decisions on where to prioritize fixes and enhancements

-As a Tenancy Management Application user-
 -I want to be able to bookmark a URL link to each section of the application-
 -So that I can quickly open the appropriate section-

As a Lab Manager

I want to be able to make bookmarks for tenancy administration tasks

So that I can save time accessing things that I use often

As a Laboratory Administrator
 I need to be informed of any concurrent changes when I am making updates in Tenancy Management
 So that I can ensure admin changes that have been made by me do not inadvertently overwrite concurrent changes made by other Laboratory Administrators

As a Laboratory Administrator
I need to have an up to date view of all Tenancy Admin changes that have been made by other users
So that I have an accurate view of Tenancy configuration

As a Developer
I need to be able to delete a tenancy
So that tenancies do not build up over time

As a Consumer of Platform Services
I need to know when tenancies are created/deleted 
So that I can provision/cleanup resources relating to my Application

As a Consumer
I need Application services to be configured with enough resources
So that applications respond in an acceptable time-frame

As a Lab Analyst
 I want to view metadata associated with files in a selected folder
 So that I can see, sort and filter based on the properties of a file

As an application developer 
I need to use the platform permission system to control user access to the functionality and data of my app
so that administrators can set access permissions according to their local policies

As an Tenant Administrator
I need to manage which applications users can access 
so that users are not given options which they cannot use

As a Lab Administrator / Analyst
I should only be able to execute functionality for a given application according to the permissions that have been granted to me 
so that I cannot perform any actions I am not authorised to do

As a Lab Administrator / Analyst
I should only see applications which are suitable for me to use 
so that I see a concise list of applications to choose from

As a Lab Analyst 
I want to be able to delete data 
so that I can comply with my laboratories data retention policy

As a Lab Analyst 
I want to be able to control how much of my internet connection bandwidth is being used for data transfer with the system 
so that I can use it for something else

As a Lab Analyst 
I want to download the current version of previously backed up data from my tenancy 
so that I can restore the current version of backed up data and us it outside the system

As a Lab Supervisor/Analyst
I want to get feedback on data transfers in and out of the system 
so that I know when transfers have completed

As a Lab Supervisor/Analyst 
I want to be able to quickly upload files infrequently into my tenancy
so that it is backed up to a secure environment

As a Lab Analyst 
I want to be able to view a list of uploaded data in my tenancy 
so that I can see what has been uploaded

As an authorized user
 I want to click the Hub icon
 So that I can navigate to the Data Management Application
As a SaaS user I want to login to the hub so that I can access apps

As a Cloud Application
I want an icon for my application to appear in the cloud hub
so that a user can launch the application
Add in support to store batch based audit events
As an account/customer success manager I need to understand tenancy utilisation so they can be licensed appropriately
As a user authorised to create tenancies I need to create a tenancy so that a customer can access a private view of the product
